emphasis.description: Used for any text content and icons used with text that needs emphasizing

body.description: Used for default text content and icons used with text

subdued.description: Used for any text content and icons used with text that requires less prominence

onBackground.description: For use on darker or colour profile backgrounds that require highly contrasted text

base.description: Used as the text or fill colour for interactive and static primary components such as links, text, and icons

hover.description: Used as the hovered text or fill colour for interactive primary components such as links and text buttons

active.description: Used as the pressed text or fill colour for interactive primary components such as links and text buttons

base.description: Used as the background for primary components such as plain buttons. Paired with text.onBackground for contrast

hover.description: Used as the hovered background for primary components such as plain buttons

active.description: Used as the hovered background for primary components such as plain buttons

muted.description: Used as the muted background for primary components such as pills and text buttons. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

mutedHover.description: Used as the hovered muted background for primary components such as pills and text buttons. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

mutedActive.description: Used as the pressed muted background for primary components such as pills and text buttons. Paired with primary.textBase for a subtler contrast

box.description: Used as a very light background for primary components such as Message and Box. Used for containers with content blocks

base.description: Used for the border colour for primary components such as buttons and Message

hover.description: Used for the hovered border colour for primary components such as buttons

active.description: Used for the pressed border colour for primary components such as buttons

text.description: For use in disabled content like text and icons

background.description: Used as the background colour for disabled components

nakedBackground.description: Used for the background in disabled components with little to no styling

border.description: Used as the border for disabled components

background.description: For use in disabled inputs as the background colour

LabelText.description: Used as the label colour for disabled inputs

base.description: For use as background colour in light profile components on contrasting surface backgrounds

contrast.description: For use as a contrasting background colour in light profile components, to match shade of surface background

hover.description: For use as background hover colour in light profile components on contrasting surface backgrounds

active.description: For use as background active colour in light profile components on contrasting surface backgrounds

base.description: Used as the content colour (text, icons) for light profile components, to match shade of constrasting surface background

mutedBase.description: Used as link colour for light profile components on contrasting surface backgrounds

mutedHover.description: Used for link hover colour for light profile components on contrasting surface backgrounds
